messages.subject: questions to ask ourselves
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for bringing that article here Kathryn. I am feeling so sad about our country right now and really hope people can learn to solve problems without
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for bringing that article here Kathryn.
I am feeling so sad about our country right now and really hope people can
learn to solve problems without killing each other.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
